Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension VistaCardioPhase® hsCRP Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™ high sensitivity CRP Control L
Dimension Vista™ high sensitivity CRP Control H
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension VistaCardioPhase hsCRP Flex reagent cartridge, Protein 2 Calibrator, and high sensitivity CRP Controls for quantitative CRP measurement using immunonephelometry
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of C-reactive protein in serum and plasma to evaluate inflammation and cardiovascular risk; calibrator for hsCRP assay; controls for assessment of precision and bias in CRP measurement on the Dimension Vista System
